COMMAND.NAME: getstyleatposition
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Return style information from a position in the text
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Return information about the style at the given character position in the text.
COMMAND.OUTPUT: The result is a value (style index), the given position where the style begins, and the position just after the end of the style.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
